Affinity.DESCRIPTION: #yAffinity can be of any color between NL [A-Red], [A-Green], [A-Blue], [A-Orange], [A-Light], [A-Dark], [A-Silver]. NL [A-Gen] refers either to generic #yAffinity, or your current best #yAffinity.

Affinity Count.DESCRIPTION: #yAffinity #yCounters are spent to activate card effects requiring them.

Affinity Level.DESCRIPTION: Increase the effectiveness of a [A-Gen] #yPower's #yScaling by #b1 per #yLevel. NL Reaching #yLevel #b1 grants #b1 use of the [A-Gen]'s #yPower and doubles the level requirement for the next use.

Affinity Skip.DESCRIPTION: Once per turn: You may skip the #yCurrent #yAffinity by clicking on it.
NAMES: affinity skip, affinity skips, skip, skips, [a-gen] skip, [a-gen] skips

Affinity Token.DESCRIPTION: A card that can be substituted for a single #yAffinity payment while in hand.

Afterlife.DESCRIPTION: You may play cards with #yAfterlife from your #yExhaust pile by #yPurging #b1 random #yNon-Afterlife card from your #yExhaust pile.

Agility.DESCRIPTION: Increases #yDamage or [Block] of cards that scale off this stat. NL Have #b1 [Dexterity] for every #b10 [G] up to #b50.

Air.DESCRIPTION: Orb: Deal #yPiercing damage to ALL enemies when #yTriggered or #yEvoked. When #yEvoked: #yCycle #b1 card.

Aura.DESCRIPTION: Auras effects are automatically activated when a condition is met. These cards are not added to your draw pile at the start of battle.

Blessing.DESCRIPTION: Increases #yDamage or [Block] of cards that scale off this stat. NL Have #b1 [L] for every #b10 [L] up to #b50.

Blinded.DESCRIPTION: Reduces #yAttack damage by #b3, or by #b4 if at least #b1 [~Dark] is #yChanneled. At the end of turn, reduce [Blinded] by #b1.

Blur.DESCRIPTION: Your #yBlock will not be removed at the start of your next turn.

Boost.DESCRIPTION: Gain the specified power, even if it was disabled due to a Stance.

Burning.DESCRIPTION: Increases incoming #yAttack damage by #b15% (min. #b1 additional damage). NL At the start of turn, lose HP equal to #b50% of [Burning] and reduce [Burning] by #b1.

Burning Weapon.DESCRIPTION: Deal double damage against enemies with [Freezing]. Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply #b2 [Burning] and remove #b4 [Freezing].

Chaos.DESCRIPTION: Orb: Reduces the cost of a random card by #b1, and increases the cost of another random card by #b1.

Choked.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, the target loses 1 HP.

Common Buff.DESCRIPTION: Buffs that are not prefixed with the name of a card.

Constricted.DESCRIPTION: Take damage at the end of each turn.

Cooldown.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play this card, reduce its #yCooldown by #b1. If it is at #b0, activate this effect instead.

Corruption.DESCRIPTION: Increases #yDamage or [Block] of cards that scale off this stat. NL Have #b1 [D] for every #b10 [D] up to #b50.

Counter-Attack.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you block damage this turn, deal damage to ALL enemies and reduce stacks by #b1. Affected by damage modifiers.

Counterattack.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you block damage this turn, deal damage to ALL enemies.

Curl Up.DESCRIPTION: Gain [Block] when you receive unblocked attack damage, then remove this power.

Current Affinity.DESCRIPTION: Cards with the [A-Gen] of the #yCurrent #yAffinity will #yMatch when played.

Cycle.DESCRIPTION: Discard a certain number of cards then draw that many cards.

Delayed Damage.DESCRIPTION: Take damage at the end of your turn. Only enemies can die from this damage.

Demon Form.DESCRIPTION: Gain #yStrength at the start of each turn.

Desecrated.DESCRIPTION: Take additional damage from any source. Deal less damage with attacks. Removed at the end of turn. Ignores [Artifact].

Desecration.DESCRIPTION: Gain [D] when a [A-Dark] card #yMatches. NL Gains #b1 #yLevel every #b5 stacks. NL Spend #b1 use to decrease a single enemy's #yAttack damage and damage resistance.

Desecration Scaling.DESCRIPTION: For each point of [D] #yScaling a card has: It gains #b+1 damage or [Block] per #yLevel of [D].

Desecration Stance.DESCRIPTION: Stance: The #yInteractable #yPower of [D] is #b50% more effective. NL When exited or re-entered: Gain #b2 [A-Dark].

Earth.DESCRIPTION: Orb: Gains projectiles when #yTriggered. When you are attacked: Remove #b1 projectile to gain [Block] and deal damage back to the attacker. When #yEvoked: Each projectile deals damage to a random enemy. Automatically #yEvoked after #b3 turns.

Electrified.DESCRIPTION: When #yAttacking, deal #b25% of damage dealt to ALL allies, or to yourself if you have no allies (min. #b1). This multiplier can be increased by card effects. NL At the start of turn, lose HP equal to #b50% of [Electrified] and reduce [Electrified] by #b1.

Electrified Weapon.DESCRIPTION: Deal double damage against enemies with [Poison]. Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply #b2 [Electrified] and remove [Poison].

Elemental Exposure.DESCRIPTION: Amplifies the effects of [Burning], [Freezing], [Electrified], and [Rippled]. Lasts for 2 turns.

Elemental Mastery.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the turn, Inflict Elemental Exposure to all enemies. Stacks increase whenever an Orb is Channeled or Induced.

Enchanted Armor.DESCRIPTION: Take less damage from #yAttacks. NL Example: NL #b10 -> #g10%, #b25 -> #g20%, NL #b50 -> #g33%, #b100 -> #g50%

Endurance.DESCRIPTION: Gain [O] when a [A-Orange] card #yMatches. NL Gains #b1 #yLevel every #b5 stacks. NL Spend #b1 use to increase the [Block] of the next [Block] card by #b+100%.

Endurance Scaling.DESCRIPTION: For each point of [O] #yScaling a card has: It gains #b+1 damage or [Block] per #yLevel of [O].

Endurance Stance.DESCRIPTION: Stance: The #yInteractable #yPower of [O] is #b50% more effective. NL When exited or re-entered: Gain #b2 [A-Orange].

Energized.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] at the start of next turn.

Enrage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a #ySkill this turn: Gain [R].

Envenom.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply [Poison].

Eternal.DESCRIPTION: Cannot be removed from your deck. When exhausted, returns to your draw pile and changes form if it has multiple forms.

Fetch.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card and move it to your hand.

Fire.DESCRIPTION: Orb: Applies [Burning] and deals [~FD] damage to the highest health enemy.

Flame Barrier.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal #b1 damage back.

Flight.DESCRIPTION: Take 50% less #yAttack damage. Lose #b1 stack until end of turn when taking damage, the power is cancelled at #b0 stacks.

Force.DESCRIPTION: Increases #yDamage or [Block] of cards that scale off this stat. NL Have #b1 [Strength] for every #b10 [R] up to #b50.

Freezing.DESCRIPTION: Reduces outgoing #yAttack damage by #b10% (can go up to #b50%, min. #b1 less damage). NL At the start of turn, lose HP equal to #b50% of [Freezing] and reduce [Freezing] by #b1.

Freezing Weapon.DESCRIPTION: Deal double damage against enemies with [Burning]. Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply #b2 [Freezing] and remove [Burning].

Genesis.DESCRIPTION: Gain additional [E] at the start of each turn.

Imitate.DESCRIPTION: #yImitating a card creates a #y0-Cost copy of it with #yPurge, and with base damage and #yBlock reduced to #b1.

Impaired.DESCRIPTION: Reduces the effectiveness of your Orbs.

Induce.DESCRIPTION: Evokes a copy of an Orb without Channeling it.

Inspiration.DESCRIPTION: Ignore the costs of the next #yInteractable Power used.

Intellect.DESCRIPTION: Increases #yDamage or [Block] of cards that scale off this stat. NL Have #b1 [Focus] for every #b10 [B] up to #b50.

Interactable.DESCRIPTION: A power whose effect can be triggered at any time by clicking on its icon and paying its cost.

Invocation.DESCRIPTION: Gain [L] when a [A-Light] card #yMatches. NL Gains #b1 #yLevel every #b5 stacks. NL Spend #b1 use to increase the amount of the next #yCommon #yBuff, [THP] gain, or #yDebuff #yBonus gained by #b+100%.

Invocation Scaling.DESCRIPTION: For each point of [L] #yScaling a card has: It gains #b+1 damage or [Block] per #yLevel of [L].

Invocation Stance.DESCRIPTION: Stance: The #yInteractable #yPower of [L] is #b50% more effective. NL When exited or re-entered: Gain #b2 [A-Light].

Juggernaut.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain #yBlock, deal damage to a random enemy.

Limited.DESCRIPTION: This effect can only trigger once per combat, across all copies of this card.

Loyal.DESCRIPTION: If this would enter your discard pile, move it to your draw pile instead.

Maintain.DESCRIPTION: This turn, an #yAffinity #yPower that was disabled due to a Stance can be gained.

Malleable.DESCRIPTION: Upon receiving damage, gain #yBlock. #yBlock gain increases as this power is triggered. Resets at the start of turn.

Match.DESCRIPTION: A card #yMatches if it has the #yAffinity of the #yCurrent #yAffinity.

Metal.DESCRIPTION: Orb: When #yTriggered: Gain Temp. [Enchanted Armor]. When #yEvoked: Gain [Metallicize].

Metallicize.DESCRIPTION: Gain #yBlock at the start of your turn.

Might.DESCRIPTION: Gain [R] when a [A-Red] card #yMatches. NL Gains #b1 #yLevel every #b5 stacks. NL Spend #b1 use to increase the damage of the next #yAttack by #b+100%.

Might Scaling.DESCRIPTION: For each point of [R] #yScaling a card has: It gains #b+1 damage or [Block] per #yLevel of [R].

Might Stance.DESCRIPTION: Stance: The #yInteractable #yPower of [R] is #b50% more effective. NL When exited or re-entered: Gain #b2 [A-Red]

Motivate.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of a random card in hand by 1 until played. Repeated N times.

Multicolor.DESCRIPTION: Cards with #yMulticolor always #yMatch. When the #yCurrent #yAffinity is #yMulticolor, all cards with [A-Gen] will #yMatch.

Multicolor Scaling.DESCRIPTION: For each point of [A-Star] #yScaling a card has: It gains #b+1 damage or [Block] per #yLevel of any [A-Gen] #yPower.

Next Affinity.DESCRIPTION: After making a #yMatch, replace the #yCurrent #yAffinity with this.

Next Turn Block.DESCRIPTION: Gain [Block] at the start of next turn.

Next Turn Draw.DESCRIPTION: Draw additional cards at the start of next turn.

Orb Slot.DESCRIPTION: #yOrb #ySlots allow you to channel additional Orbs.

Phasing.DESCRIPTION: You have a 35% chance to dodge each attack. Reduce this chance by 5% each turn. Stacking this power resets and delays the chance reduction by 1 turn.

Plated Armor.DESCRIPTION: Gain #yBlock at the end of your turn. Reduced by #b1 when receiving damage.

Rebound.DESCRIPTION: Put the next card you play this turn on top of your draw pile.

Regeneration.DESCRIPTION: Heal HP at the end of the turn. Reduce by 1 each turn.

Reload.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards, activate this effect that many times.

Resistance.DESCRIPTION: Reduces incoming #yAttack damage and the effects of [Frail], [Weak], [Vulnerable], and [Impaired].

Ricochet.DESCRIPTION: Reduce a card's #yRicochet by #b1 for every turn that it is in the Exhaust pile. If it is at #b0 while in your Exhaust pile, activate this effect instead.

Rippled.DESCRIPTION: When attacked, #b25% of damage received is dealt to ALL allies. This multiplier can be increased by card effects. NL At the start of turn, lose HP equal to #b50% of [Rippled] and reduce [Rippled] by #b1.

Self-Immolation.DESCRIPTION: When you play a card with [Block], ALL characters take [DD] equal to its [Block] times this power's stacks.

Semi-Limited.DESCRIPTION: This effect can only trigger once per turn, across all copies of this card.

Slow.DESCRIPTION: For every card you have played this turn, take #b10% more damage from #yAttacks.

Soul.DESCRIPTION: When played, reduce #ySoul by #b1. If it is at #b0, #yExhaust this and add the specified card to your discard pile.

Starter.DESCRIPTION: Activates if played at the start of turn.

Startup.DESCRIPTION: Play this effect at the start of combat.

Stoned.DESCRIPTION: If [Burning], [Freezing], [Electrified], [Rippled], or [Swirled] would be reduced: Remove 1 stack of this power instead.

Support Damage.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to the enemy with the lowest HP at the end of each turn. Affected by damage modifiers.

Swirled.DESCRIPTION: If the target has [Burning], [Freezing], [Electrified], or [Rippled]: Spread 1 of each to ALL other enemies, then reduce this by 1. If there are no other enemies, increase stacks of each by 1.

Synergy.DESCRIPTION: A card #ySynergizes if the last card played this turn shares an #yAffinity color, with at least #b1 of the #b2 #yAffinities being #yLV2.

Teamwork.DESCRIPTION: Teamwork is equal to the number of cards in hand that have the most common #yAffinity amongst your hand.

Technic.DESCRIPTION: Gain [S] when a [A-Silver] card #yMatches. NL Gains #b1 #yLevel every #b5 stacks. NL Spend #b1 use to gain #b1 additional [E] per turn for the rest of the combat.

Technic Scaling.DESCRIPTION: For each point of [S] #yScaling a card has: It gains #b+1 damage or [Block] per #yLevel of [S].

Technic Stance.DESCRIPTION: Stance: The #yInteractable #yPower of [S] is #b50% more effective. NL When exited or re-entered: Gain #b2 [A-Silver].

Temporary HP.DESCRIPTION: Temporary HP lasts until end of combat.

Temporary Thorns.DESCRIPTION: When attacked, deal damage to the attacker. Removed at the end of turn.

Velocity.DESCRIPTION: Gain [G] when a [A-Green] card #yMatches. NL Gains #b1 #yLevel every #b5 stacks. NL Spend #b1 use to draw #b2 cards.

Velocity Scaling.DESCRIPTION: For each point of [G] #yScaling a card has: It gains #b+1 damage or [Block] per #yLevel of [G].

Velocity Stance.DESCRIPTION: Stance: The #yInteractable #yPower of [G] is #b50% more effective. NL When exited or re-entered: Gain #b2 [A-Green].

Vigor.DESCRIPTION: The next Attack played deals additional damage per hit.

Vitality.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain [Temporary HP].

Water.DESCRIPTION: Orb: Add #yTemporary #yHP to this orb's #yEvoke while Channeled. Automatically #yEvoked after 3 turns, giving you #yTemporary #yHP. Heal #b2 HP the first #b2 times Water is #yEvoked this combat.

Willpower.DESCRIPTION: Increases #yDamage or [Block] of cards that scale off this stat. NL Have #b1 [Endurance] for every #b10 [O] up to #b50.

Wisdom.DESCRIPTION: Gain [B] when a [A-Blue] card #yMatches. NL Gains #b1 #yLevel every #b5 stacks. NL Spend #b1 use to gain #b1 Temp. [Focus] and increase the [Focus] of ALL #yOrbs by #b100% this turn.

Wisdom Scaling.DESCRIPTION: For each point of [B] #yScaling a card has: It gains #b+1 damage or [Block] per #yLevel of [B].

Wisdom Stance.DESCRIPTION: Stance: The #yInteractable #yPower of [B] is #b50% more effective. NL When exited or re-entered: Gain #b2 [A-Blue].

~Block Scaling.DESCRIPTION: This #yAttack's scaling applies both to its damage and its #yBlock.

~Branch Upgrade.DESCRIPTION: When you upgrade this card, you may choose #b1 of #b2 upgrade paths for this card.

~Brutal.DESCRIPTION: Affected twice by damage modifiers, excluding #yAffinity #yPowers and #yScaling.

~Crystallize.DESCRIPTION: A Status card that gives [Metallicize] at the cost of HP and [E].

~Dark.DESCRIPTION: Orb: Deals [~DD] damage to the lowest health enemy.

~Dark Damage.DESCRIPTION: Ignores #yThorns. For each hit, Remove #b1 [Electrified]: Deal +#b60% damage, and [Electrified] gains +#b5% effect bonus.

~Delayed.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, place this card on the bottom.

~Electric Damage.DESCRIPTION: Ignores #yThorns. For each hit, Remove #b1 [Rippled]: Deal +#b60% damage, and [Rippled] gains +#b5% effect bonus.

~Elemental.DESCRIPTION: Ignores #yThorns. Deal #b30% additional damage if the enemy has #yBlock.

~Ethereal.DESCRIPTION: #yExhausted if in hand at the end of turn.

~Fire Damage.DESCRIPTION: Ignores #yThorns. For each hit, Remove #b1 [Freezing]: Deal +#b60% damage, and [Freezing] gains +#b2% effect bonus.

~Ice Damage.DESCRIPTION: Ignores #yThorns. For each hit, Remove #b1 [Burning]: Deal +#b60% damage, and [Burning] gains +#b5% effect bonus.

~Innate.DESCRIPTION: Start each combat with this card in hand. Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, place this card on the top.

~Lightning.DESCRIPTION: Orb: Deals [~ED] damage to a random enemy, prioritizing enemies with [~Lock-On].

~Lock-On.DESCRIPTION: Receive #b50% more damage from Orbs and #b25% from #yRanged attacks.

~Multiform.DESCRIPTION: You may change this card's form in the pop-up viewer from your master deck outside of combat.

~Orb Core.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 orb. NL  NL Gain a bonus effect on your second Synergy each turn.

~Retain.DESCRIPTION: Retained cards are not discarded at the end of turn.

~RetainInfinite.DESCRIPTION: Retained cards are not discarded at the end of turn. NL #yThis #yeffect #yis #ypermanent.

~RetainOnce.DESCRIPTION: Retained cards are not discarded at the end of turn. NL #bOnce #bactivated, #bremove #bthis #beffect.

~Steal.DESCRIPTION: You can steal up to #b50 #yGold from a boss, #b25 #yGold from an elite, or #b10 #yGold from other non-minion enemies.

~Trophy1.DESCRIPTION: The highest Ascension level at which Act 3 was cleared with this series.

~Trophy2.DESCRIPTION: The highest Ascension level at which Act 4 was cleared with this series.

~Trophy3.DESCRIPTION: The highest Ascension level at which Act 5 was cleared with this series.

~Unique.DESCRIPTION: Can be #yUpgraded any number of times. You can only have 1 copy of this card in your deck, additional copies will #yUpgrade this card instead.
